description: Migrar sistemas de Personalidade/Traits para v2.0

userStories.title: Migrar big-five-neo-pi-r (31 arquivos)
userStories.description: Migrar todos os perfis NEO-PI-R para formato v2.0 com frontmatter YAML
acceptanceCriteria: Frontmatter com profile_id, system, system_category, evidence_level, version

userStories.title: Migrar bigfive (31 arquivos)
userStories.description: Migrar todos os perfis Big Five genéricos para formato v2.0

userStories.title: Migrar clifton (35 arquivos)
userStories.description: Migrar perfis Clifton duplicados para formato v2.0

userStories.title: Migrar keirsey-temperaments (21 arquivos)
userStories.description: Migrar perfis Keirsey Temperaments para formato v2.0

userStories.title: Migrar belbin (10 arquivos)
userStories.description: Migrar perfis Belbin Team Roles para formato v2.0

userStories.title: Migrar socionics (9 arquivos)
userStories.description: Migrar perfis Socionics para formato v2.0

migrationScript: cd /Users/alan/Code/mmos/outputs/perfis/{system} && for f in *.md; do case "$f" in *_v2.md) continue;; esac; name="${f%.md}"; v2_file="${name}_v2.md"; if [ ! -f "$v2_file" ]; then slug=$(echo "$name" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr ' ' '_'); printf '%s\n' '---' 'profile_id: "{system}_'"$slug"'"' 'display_name: "'"$name"'"' 'system: "{system}"' 'system_category: "{category}"' 'evidence_level: "{evidence}"' 'version: "2.0"' 'related_profiles:' '  - system: "bigfive"' '    profiles: []' '---' '' > "$v2_file"; cat "$f" >> "$v2_file"; echo "Created $v2_file"; fi; done
